reviews.review_msg: Dr. Breshears is an amazing prof! Initially, I thought I'd get bored in such a class but she made it very interesting! I will be using the terms I learned in this class for the years to come! She comes from a school teaching background and is such a caring and kind prof. I would not hesitate to take another class with her if she offers one!

Dr. Breshears was one of the best profs I've ever had. She cares about each student and is always there to listen to you.
She also made one of the most boring subjects interesting and fun to engage with!
She even brought us cookies in our last class which was super cute and attentive!
If you get a chance to get a class with her, don't hesitate.

Soft-spoken and cares about her students success. Fair exams and interesting assignments with clear marking criteria. Responsive to emails. For this course, there were a lot of participation marks. Lots of reading but manageable.
